citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an effective pest control program in place to control mammalian pests. Numerous flies were
observed on two Patagonia cavies and two water buffalo calves. The tips of the cavies’ ears appeared to have previously
healed trauma. Flies were attracted to the tips of the ears and the cavies continuously swiped at the ears to remove the
flies. Flies circled the ears and legs of the water buffalo calves and the calves continuously twitched their ears due to the
flies. While the pens were kept clean, no other fly control was seen (e.g. fly strips or fans).
Pests can post a hazard to the health and wellbeing of the animals by either injuring them, exposing them to potential
diseases and illness, or contaminating their food.
Correct by August 14, 2025 by establishing and maintaining a safe and effective program for the control of insects,
ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
The facility does not have an effective pest control program in place to control mammalian pests. Numerous flies were 
observed on two Patagonia cavies and two water buffalo calves. The tips of the cavies’ ears appeared to have previously 
healed trauma. Flies were attracted to the tips of the ears and the cavies continuously swiped at the ears to remove the 
flies. Flies circled the ears and legs of the water buffalo calves and the calves continuously twitched their ears due to the 
flies. While the pens were kept clean, no other fly control was seen (e.g. fly strips or fans).  
 
Pests can post a hazard to the health and wellbeing of the animals by either injuring them, exposing them to potential 
diseases and illness, or contaminating their food. 
 
Correct by August 14, 2025 by establishing and maintaining a safe and effective program for the control of insects, 
ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
